content: seed bead 18 seed beads up behind st before finishing chain 3 slip_stitch into top of cluster chain 4 bsc in next chain 3 lp chain 4 * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into the top of the 1st cluster end off weave end in 16 clusters with fringe slide cover onto glass tree ornament ornament variation stringing pattern for variation 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red 1 green 8 white * 1 green 1 red dagger 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red 1 green 8 white 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red 1 green 8 white * repeat till you have 16 dagger beads strung then string 32 beads going alternating red and green 1 red 1 green 1 red ect then string 16 green beads follow instructions for ornament with these changes round 5-8 single_crochet in same space as joining * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 3 lp 8 repeat from * to * around ending with chain 1 double_crochet in to 1st single_crochet of round chain 1 round 9 chain 3 3 treble_crochet in same st holding the last lp of each st on hook 4 lps on hook yo draw through all 4 loops chain 4 bsc in 2nd chain from hook bringing 1 pattern 8 seed beads 1green 1 red 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red dagger 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red 1 green 8 white beads up behind st before finishing be sure to draw your stitch up tight before finishing for best effects chain 3 slip_stitch into top of cluster chain 4 bsc with green bead in next chain 3 lp chain 4 * 4 treble_crochet in next single_crochet holding the last lp of each st on hook 5 lps on hook yo draw through all 5 loops chain 4 bsc in 2nd chain from hook bringing 1 pattern of 8 seed beads 1green 1 red 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red dagger 1 green 8 white 1 green 1 red 1 green 8 white beads up behind st before finishing chain 3 slip_stitch into top of cluster chain 4 bsc with in next chain 3 lp chain 4 * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into the top of the 1st cluster end off weave end in 16 clusters with fringe slide cover onto glass tree ornament created and designed by kathryn a white www crochetnbeads com all patterns may be duplicated for private use but not for resale november 28th 2005 3
